alert.note: Alert for Kingman; Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 9:13PM CDT until April 14 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL RENO AND WESTERN KINGMAN COUNTIES... At 913 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near South Hutchinson to 7 miles west of Haven to 5 miles east of Pretty Prairie to 6 miles northeast of Kingman to 8 miles east of Nashville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, South Hutchinson, Arlington, Cunningham, Partridge, Abbyville, Nashville, Willowdale and Penalosa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
